helpBoatManning1: Click on a paddler in the list to select them.
helpBoatManning2: Then click on an empty seat in the boat.
helpBoatManningSwap: Click on another occupied seat to swap the paddlers.
helpBoatManning3: To remove someone, hover over the seat and click the small X.
helpBoatManning4: Use the pin needle (top left of seat) to lock a paddler. They won't be moved by Magic AI.
changeBoatSizeConfirm: Are you sure you want to change the boat size? The current lineup will be cleared.
helpBoatSizeDesc: Switch between Standard (20) and Small (10) boat. Each size has its own completely separate plan.
helpCalculationDesc: How Balance and Trim are calculated:
helpCalculation1: Standard (20): Split at middle (Rows 1-5 Front, 6-10 Back).
helpCalculation2: Small (10): Middle row (3) is excluded from Front/Back comparison to ensure fairness.
helpCalculation3: Drummer counts to Front, Steer counts to Back.
helpSpecialItems2: Guest: Add temporary paddlers not in the squad.
helpToolsStats1: Magic AI: The wand automatically fills the boat optimally.
helpToolsStats2: Trim: Use the slider to adjust target weight (Bow/Stern).
helpToolsStats3: Export: Save the lineup as an image.
helpManageEvents1: Create new trainings or regattas using the form on the left.
helpManageEvents2: Click Plan to start boat manning for an event.
helpManageEvents3: Manage attendance directly in the event list.
helpMembers1: Add new members using the form.
helpMembers2: Edit members by clicking the pencil icon in the squad list.
helpMembers3: Delete members with the trash icon (requires 2x confirmation).
helpToolsDesc: Use the slider for trim and Magic AI for auto-fill.

tourWelcomeDesc: A short tour to show you the most important features.
tourNewEventDesc: Create a new training session or regatta here.
tourMembersDesc: Add new paddlers to your team here.
tourEventListDesc: Here you see all upcoming events. Click on one to plan.
tourSquadDesc: Overview of all your paddlers and their stats.

features: UI Optimization: Renamed 'Plan' button for paddlers to 'View Plan'.
technical: Security Update: Comprehensive permission checks for all API endpoints.
Ghost Placement Fix: Prevents duplicate assignments via strict checks.
bugfixes: Planner: Automatic data refresh when opening the planner to avoid stale data.
Security Update: Permissions for team editing and member management have been tightened.
UI Improvement: Edit buttons are now only visible to captains.

features: New Help Center: centralized guides, FAQs, and support contact.
Enhanced Member Management: Manage invites ('Pending' status) and remove members.
Role Management: New 'Make Captain' and 'Remove Captain' button actions.
Security Update: Double confirmation required when deleting a team.
Passwordless Login: Sign in via Email (Magic Link) is now supported.
Team Invites: Invite people via email and link them to existing paddlers.
technical: New API endpoint for contact support form.

features: Export Improvements: Date in filename and clean image without UI controls.
Layout Optimization: Squad and Boat windows now align in height.
Guest Management: Consistent new interface for adding guests.
The training date is now displayed in the header title.
Legal: Added Imprint, Privacy Policy, and Safety Disclaimers.
Smoother animations during navigation and loading.
technical: Switched to server-side calculation for balance stats (Privacy).
Modernized image export function for better compatibility.
Optimized loading behavior prevents flickering at startup.
bugfixes: Fix: Profile menu was partially hidden in planner view.

features: You can now sign in with your Google or GitHub account.
Your profile picture is now displayed in the member list.
Paddlers can be linked to user accounts ‚Äì so you can see who belongs to which account.
Your settings (theme, language, active team) are now saved and available on all your devices.
Notifications now appear as beautiful popups instead of browser dialogs.
technical: Unified input fields for better readability in dark mode.
Improved spacing and separators in the header area.

features: You can now manage multiple teams and switch between them.
New team management page: Create, edit, and delete teams.
Your data is now securely stored in the cloud ‚Äì no more data loss when switching browsers.
Teams can now be personalized with logo, website, and social media links.
technical: Migrated from LocalStorage to PostgreSQL database.
PWA install button moved to footer.
Standardized page width across all pages.

features: New boat type: Small boat with 10 seats now available.
Standard and small boats have separate seating plans.
The balance display now shows more clearly how the weight is distributed.
Swap paddlers: Simply click on two occupied seats to swap the paddlers.
Selected paddlers are now highlighted even on occupied seats.
technical: Improved help texts in planning mode.

features: New animated dragon boat graphic on the landing page.
The landing page now also supports dark mode.
bugfixes: The app now opens correctly when launched from the home screen.

technical: Added API interface for automatic boat seating.
Introduced automated tests and quality assurance.

features: The app is now available in German and English.
Your language is detected automatically.
Dark mode now automatically matches your system settings.
Interactive tutorials show you how everything works.
Help content now adapts to where you are in the app.
The automatic seating feature is now called "Magic AI".
technical: All dialog windows now have a unified design.

features: New cleaner design in the header area.
Added imprint and legal information.
Dark mode toggle improved.
Manage your team: Add paddlers and edit their data.
Plan trainings and regattas with attendance tracking.
Fill your boat via drag & drop or let Magic AI do it for you.
See at a glance how the weight is distributed in the boat.

landingHeroSubtitle: The ultimate manager for Dragonboat teams. Plan trainings, manage lineups, and stay on top.
landingFeaturesSubtitle: Focus on the sport, we'll handle the organization.
landingFeature1Desc: Perfect boat lineup in 3 seconds. Our AI considers balance, trim, and side preferences.
landingFeature2Desc: Whether Standard (20s) or Small Boat (10s) - plan intuitively via drag & drop for every race class.
landingFeature3Desc: A paddler drops out last minute? No problem. Adjust the lineup right at the dock on your smartphone.
landingFeature4Desc: Coaching multiple teams? No problem. Manage different squads and switch between them instantly.
landingFeature5Desc: Your data is safe. Hosted in Frankfurt, developed with 'Privacy First' principles.
landingFeature6Desc: Developed from personal experience as a team captain to solve a real problem in dragon boat racing.
deleteTeamWarning: Deleting a team will permanently remove all its paddlers and events.
weightDisclaimer: Your weight is visible only to team captains for boat balancing.
helpTeamEditGeneralDesc: Here you can manage the basic information of your team. Change the team name, update the website, or upload a new team logo to make your team recognizable. Social media links can also be managed here.
helpTeamEditMembersDesc: Manage who has access to your team here. You can invite new members via email. You can assign roles to existing members: 'Captain' for full administrative rights or 'Paddler' for regular team members. If necessary, you can also remove members.
errorUserNotFound: User not found. Please ask them to sign up first.
privacyIntro: Responsible party within the meaning of data protection laws:
privacyHostingText: We host our application with Vercel Inc., 340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA. The provider is certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework. Data is processed in Frankfurt (Germany). Vercel collects log files with IP addresses to ensure security and stability.
privacyDatabaseText: Our database is provided by Prisma (Prisma Data Services GmbH, Berlin) and is also hosted in Frankfurt. Your user data (name, email, team data) is stored here.
privacyAuthText: For login, we use NextAuth.js with Google and GitHub providers. When you log in via these services, we receive your email address, name, and profile picture. We use this data exclusively for identification and user management.
privacyEmailsText: Transaction emails (e.g., invitations) are sent via Resend (2261 Market Street #4816, San Francisco, CA 94114, USA). Data processing takes place in Ireland. We have concluded a data processing agreement with Resend.
privacyRightsText: You have the right to access, rectification, deletion, and restriction of processing of your stored data. You can object to the processing of your data at any time.
disclaimerSafety: Safety Notice: The calculations provided in this application (e.g., for balance and trim) are for assistance and guidance only. They do not replace the professional judgment and responsibility of the boat captain. Use at your own risk.
disclaimerWarranty: Software Warranty: The software is provided 'as is', without warranty of any kind, express or implied. No guarantee is made for error-free operation or continuous availability.
techInfo: Built with Next.js, Vercel, Prisma & Resend.

helpIntroDesc: Find guides and answers to common questions here.
helpCategoryTeamDesc: Create, join, and leave teams. Manage members.

faqLeaveTeamTitle: How do I leave a team?
faqLeaveTeamAnswer: You can leave a team anytime via your user profile:
faqLeaveTeamStep1: Click on your profile picture/avatar (top right).
faqNoLeaveButtonTitle: I don't see the 'Leave Team' button?
faqNoLeaveButtonAnswer: As a Captain, you are responsible for the team. To leave, you must either delete the team in settings or promote another user to Captain (and demote yourself). Only then will the option appear.
faqCreateTeamTitle: How do I create a new team?
faqCreateTeamAnswer: Click on the team name in the main menu (top left), select 'Switch Team', and then click the '+' symbol.

faqWeightChangeAnswer: Your Team Captain can update your weight and paddling side to optimize the boat planning. Your own changes will overwrite this, but it's best to coordinate with your Captain.
